tit.cmt: 現在駅名が変わっているようですが、原稿ではまだ変わっておりませんので、原稿通りが良いと考え、原稿どうりに訳してあります。
on the を削除しました。

sen.j: 丸太町駅（まるたまちえき）は、京都市左京区東丸太町にある、京阪電気鉄道京阪鴨東線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Higashi-Maruta-cho, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Fushimi-momoyama Station is a stop of the Keihan Oto Line, which is operated by Keihan Electric Railway.
Fushimi-momoyama Station, located in Higashi-Maruta-cho, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop of the Keihan Oto Line, which is operated by Keihan Electric Railway.
Marutamachi Station, located in Higashi-Maruta-cho, Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop of the Keihan Oto Line, which is operated by Keihan Electric Railway.
sen.cmt: Marutamachi Station に修正しました。

sen.j: 2008年10月19日の京阪中之島線の開業と同時に神宮丸太町駅（じんぐうまるたまちえき）に改称の予定。
sen.e: It is scheduled that the station name is to be changed toJingu-marutamachi Station on October 19, 2008 when Keihan Nakanoshima Line is to start tis operation.
It is scheduled that the station's name will be changed to Jingu-marutamachi Station on October 19, 2008, when Keihan Nakanoshima Line starts its operation.
It is scheduled that the station's name will be changed to Jingu-marutamachi Station on October 19, 2008, when the Keihan Nakanoshima Line starts its operation.
sen.cmt: "Keihan Nakanoshima Line"→"the Keihan Nakanoshima Line"に変更しました。

sen.j: 島式1面2線のホームを持つ地下駅。
sen.e: It is located on the ground level, with an island platform serving two tracks.
It is located on the ground level, with an island platform serving two tracks.
It is an underground station, with an island platform serving two tracks.

sen.j: 丸太町橋東詰、川端丸太町交差点の地下に位置している。
sen.e: It is located under Marutacho-Bashi-Higashizume (the east end of the Marutacho bridge) and under the Kawabata Marutamachi crossing.
It is located under Marutacho-Bashi-Higashizume (the east end of Marutacho Bridge) and under the Kawabata Marutamachi crossing.
It is located under Marutacho-Bashi-Higashizume (the east end of Marutacho Bridge) and under the Kawabata Marutamachi crossing.

sen.j: 地下2階建てとなっており、地下1階に改札・コンコース、地下2階にホームがある。
sen.e: With two stories underground, the entrance/exit gate and concourse are provided on the first basement level and the platform on the second basement level.
With two stories underground, the entrance/exit gate and concourse are provided on the first basement level and the platform on the second basement level.
With two stories underground, the ticket gate and concourse are provided on the first basement level and the platform on the second basement level.
sen.cmt: 改札→ticket gate としました。

sen.j: 改札口は1ヶ所のみとなっている。
sen.e: The entrance/exit gate is provided at one location.
The entrance/exit gate is provided at one location.
The ticket gate is provided at one location.
sen.cmt: 改札→ticket gate としました。

sen.j: 京都大学医学部付属病院・府立医大付属病院への最寄り駅ということも有り、開業時から身障者対応エレベーター2基（地上とコンコース・改札内コンコースとホームに各1基）・多目的トイレ・点字案内図、点字料金表などのバリアフリー対策が施された。
sen.e: Being the station nearest to Kyoto University Hospital and University Hospital, Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine, this station was provided, even when it started its operation, with barrier-free measures, such as two elevators for physically handicapped persons (one between the ground level and the concourse and the other betweene the concourse area inside the gate and the platform), a multi-purpose lavatory, a Braille-using guide map and a Braille-using fare table.

Being the station nearest to Kyoto University Hospital and University Hospital, Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine, this station was provided, even at the very start, with barrier-free measures such as two elevators for physically handicapped persons (one between the ground level and the concourse and the other between the concourse area inside the gate and platform), a multipurpose lavatory, a Braille guide map and a Braille fare table.

Being the station nearest to Kyoto University Hospital and University Hospital, Kyoto Prefectural University of Medicine, this station was provided, even at the very start, with barrier-free measures such as two elevators for physically handicapped persons (one between the ground level and the concourse and the other between the concourse area inside the gate and platform), a multipurpose lavatory, a Braille guide map and a Braille fare table.

sen.j: 同じ駅名の京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄烏丸線の丸太町駅 (京都市営地下鉄)とは1キロほど離れている。
sen.e: Marutamachi Station, with the same name as that of this station, on Karasuma Line of Kyoto Municipal Subway is located at a place around 1 km from this station.
sen.cmt: "京都市営地下鉄"が3回記されておりますが、意味を考え1回に記述にしてあります。
sen.e: Marutamachi Station, having the same name as this station, on the Karasuma Line of the Kyoto Municipal Subway, is located approximately 1 km away.
Marutamachi Station, having the same name as this station, on the Karasuma Line of the Kyoto Municipal Subway, is located approximately one kilometer away.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

tit.cmt: ホームが１つなので、単数にしました。

sen.e: * The effective length of the platform portion for each of the tracks is for eight-car trains.
* The platform portion for each of the tracks has a length sufficient to accommodate an eight-car train.
* The platform portion for each of the tracks has a length sufficient to accommodate an eight-car train.

sen.j: 自動放送の編成長案内は上下線ともない。
sen.e: No announement is made for the number of cars of incoming trains, both for up-trains and down-trains.
No announcement is made for the number of cars of incoming trains, either for up-trains or down-trains.
No announcement is made for the number of cars of incoming trains, either for inbound trains or outbound trains.
sen.cmt: 上り→inbound, 下り→outbound としました。

sen.j: 駅は川端通の地下、丸太町通との交差点のやや北よりに位置する。
sen.e: The station is located under Kawabata-dori Street and in the slightly north of the crossing between Kawabata-dori Street and Marutamachi-dori Street.
The station is located under Kawabata-dori Street, slightly north of the crossing between Kawabata-dori Street and Marutamachi-dori Street.
The station is located under Kawabata-dori Street, slightly north of the crossing between Kawabata-dori Street and Marutamachi-dori Street.

sen.j: 駅西側を鴨川 (淀川水系)が流れ、丸太町橋がかかる。
sen.e: The Kamo-gawa River (of the Yod-gawa River system) flows on the west side of the station, and the Marutamachi bridge is placed across the river.
The Kamo-gawa River (of the Yodo-gawa River system) flows on the west side of the station, and Marutamachi Bridge crosses over the river.
The Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa River system) flows on the west side of the station, and Marutamachi-bashi Bridge crosses over the river.

sen.j: 駅周辺は主に住宅地であり、学生向けのワンルームマンションが目立つ。
sen.e: The area around the station is a residential district and many one-room apartments are placed
The area around the station is a residential district in which many one-room apartments are located.
The area around the station is a residential district in which many one-room apartments are located.

sen.j: 1989年（平成元年）10月5日 鴨東線開通と同時に開業。
